posts.post_content:
All prices assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

Shipping is $5 for one or two cards and goes up just to may actual cost.  A big group wouldn't be more than $10.

Too many scans to upload here but if you'd like to look at any of these, just follow this link and type in the player you are looking for in the search bar (disregard the much higher prices on ebay):  

[URL="https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_ssn=lukesvintagecards"]https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_ssn=lukesvintagecards[/URL]

Prices are firm for now.
